education.degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
Maharashtra State Board of Higher Secondary Education

projects.name: SpeechMood Analyzer
details: Developed and deployed a real-time emotion detection app using speech recognition and the Hugging Face base model.
Achieved an emotion recognition accuracy of 91% with the pre-trained model for real-time analysis.
Contributed knowledge in integrating speech recognition with advanced NLP models and creating interactive applications using Streamlit.

projects.name: Autosprout
details: Built smart irrigation system with ESP8266 for Wi-Fi, enabling remote soil moisture monitoring and control.
Designed web UI with HTML/CSS for real-time soil moisture data and Python Flask for remote irrigation control.
Grid-based design ensures thorough coverage and effective water distribution.
Oversaw all project phases, from hardware selection and sensor integration to web application development and deployment.

projects.name: Emotion Recognition System
details: Engineered Emotion Recognition System with Machine Learning and Deep Learning, enhancing user experience through real-time emotion analysis.
The image classification model achieved an overall accuracy of 59.79% on the test set.
The class-wise accuracy varied widely, with the highest accuracy for happy faces (81.44%) and the lowest for disgusted faces (54.05%).
The model also achieved a precision of 61.73%, a recall of 59.79%, and an F1 score of 60.02%.

achievements.title: Research Publication at National Conference
achievements.details: Published a research paper titled 'Automatic Irrigation System using IoT' in Springer. Presented at the National Conference on Recent Technologies & Innovations in Electronics & Photonics, hosted by MIT World Peace University in collaboration with the Department of Scientific & Industrial Research, Govt. of India on Feb 9th and 10th, 2024.
